counters.title: {{defender}} Konter
counters.description: Dies sind deine Top 6 Konter um ein {{tier}} {{defender}} Raid Boss zu besiegen. Klicke Erstelle Raid Party oder Raid Party beitreten um Hilfe gegen diesen Boss zu erhalten.

summary.title: {{defender}} Raid Simulation
summary.description: These are your top 6 counters to defeat a {{tier}} {{defender}} raid boss. Click Create RaidParty or Join Raid Party to get help vs. this boss!

settings.suggestPokebox: Once you get a hang of things, you should tweak your settings to use your Pokebox which you can quickly fill on the alternative tab
settings.BATTLE_PARTY_LEVEL_20: Using best level 20 counters. This is a great default setting to get started.  $t(raidBosses:counters.settings.suggestPokebox)
settings.BATTLE_PARTY_POKEBOX: Using your best counters. Don't see what you have here? Add Pokemon in your Pokebox which you can quickly fill on the counters tab

summary.emptyPokebox: Custom results will be here after you add Pokemon to your Pokebox. Try adding pokemon that you have on the 3rd tab.

combatants.title: {{defender}} Raid Party
combatants.description: Pokebattler performed 200 simulations of the raid battle for each possible counter to choose which Pokemon to use. The top 6 were then run in 200 simulations as a party. The following is the combatant details from a typical result.

joinPartyDialog.title: Join Party
joinPartyDialog.description: Enter your friend's party id to see your raid party results

raidPartyCard.title: {{defender}}
raidPartyCard.summary: {{numReadyPlayers}} out of {{players}} players are ready. {{ownerName}}'s party was created at {{createdAt}}
